backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, storage maps, and comparison modules for videos, quizzes, user profiles, settings, and admin configuration with authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage hero image UI update to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their responsibilities and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark CSS variables and theme tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the Vite React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication and admin guards, and global layout and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for listing, adding, and deleting video categories with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/DashboardV: Form allowing admins to view and update dashboard visual settings such as colors, gradients, and overlays.
frontend/src/components/admin/DonationLi: Provides a form to view and update the donation link stored in admin settings, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomeConten: Dialog-based editor allowing admins to update various homepage text fields and save them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageVi: Form for configuring homepage visual settings including colors, overlays, and hero image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Handles uploading, previewing, updating, and removing the site logo using ExternalBlob and admin settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizEditor: Editor modal for creating or updating quizzes by selecting a video, adding questions, answers, and validation before saving.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizzesMan: Displays a list of quizzes with create, edit, and delete actions, integrating QuizEditor and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeSetti: Form for viewing and updating primary and secondary theme colors using settings data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Lists users with anonymized principals and allows admins to update user status via a dropdown.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoEdito: Dialog for adding or editing videos, including uploading thumbnails and selecting categories.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideosMana: Displays video library with options to add, edit, or delete videos and manages related dialogs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen showing an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout states and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to create a profile with name and optional email before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/donations/PostQu: Modal shown after a quiz encouraging donations using a configured link.
frontend/src/components/donations/ShowSo: Button that opens the configured donation link in a new tab if available.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContent: Displays homepage hero text from settings with optional admin edit button and editor modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders a simple footer with credit text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Shows site header with logo, navigation links, auth/admin options, and a mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides global page layout including themed header, footer, and content wrapper.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Fetches and displays the top 5 leaderboard results with anonymized usernames and scoring.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/QuizTaki: Handles quiz answering, submission, scoring UI, and post-quiz donation modal.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/VideoQui: Loads quizzes for a video and allows selecting and taking a quiz.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Displays a video with YouTube embedding and includes quizzes if the user is allowed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Determines current user authentication, role, and profile using actor and identity hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as settings, videos, categories, and more via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Applies theme colors from settings data to CSS variables and returns the active theme.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays the user's quiz history using fetched results with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with configurable visuals and tabbed management panels for content, users, and appearance.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with dynamic hero visuals, leaderboard, and categoryâ€‘organized video sections.
frontend/src/utils/privacy.ts: Provides a utility to anonymize a user ID by generating a short, stable label.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist URL params across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, architecture, and known issues for the Pocketflix ICP web app.
